post.body: It is pulling names from high school, college and grad school that I haven't heard in years.
Wonder what would happen if I just showed up at their room in Vegas looking for somewhere to crash :)
It was E3. CES has gotten almost too big. It fills up the LV Convention Center and overflows into the Sands, too.
That would be awesome. I never say no to a demo.
Glad to do it. I've been a happy Mozy customer for the past 18 months or so.
Damn, did you get an Orange Julius at the mall food court, too?
LOL, nice!
Thanks for the mention.
Through some research I am doing on internal social networks. Toughest part is finding screenshots to use to discuss them.
Do you have a link for the Gladwell tickets? I may have to make a trip back to Louisville for that.
I'll probably be on in about an hour or so.
It's ridiculous. I almost want to DVR it and then just zip right through it at 8:30.
Haha! If I'm a celeb, this place is in real trouble.
I'm trying. If I make it out, I'll definitely give you a call.
Thx, I appreciate it. The presentation is just to show our HR team what other companies are doing with internal social networks.
It was super! Have another one tomorrow morning.
That sounds like a TwitPic waiting to happen
What did you say?
Yeah, the 9/day seems low compared to a lot of people. Tend to go crazy during SXSW, CES and other events, tho.
Haha! It's a corporate Blackberry, so unless it dies, I am stuck with it for a couple of years.
Thanks. Yep, it's on my calendar. Look forward to meeting you.
So far, I like Storm a lot. Like the iPhone, it takes some time to master the keyboard.
Updated my Moto Q9h to Windows Mobile 6.1 last night *before* backing up my contacts list. Doh! Lost 100+ numbers.
http://twitpic.com/pyxe - Mahlon playing bass at his strings concert
At Mahlon's holiday strings concert.
Trying to catch up on e-mail before the end of the day. Have an all-day off-site tomorrow.
Back from lunch with @JamieTimm.
Trying to get the stars to align on a big project we need to get done before the end of the year.
Having my mind blown by the accuracy of Facebook's "People You May Know" list.
Also found a bunch of hair metal autographs from the 80s including Metallica, Queensryche, Bulletboys and Skid Row.
Found a box full of photos from college and high school. Time to get some payback on those who have posted bad photos of me on Facebook :)
Got the new PS3 firmware update (that added fullscreen Flash support) and checked out Hulu. Looks pretty decent blown up to 65".
Just finished watching Step Brothers. So many ridiculously funny lines.
Wishing I was going to CES again. Maybe @jasonhiner and @billdetwiler need some help covering the show :)
Looking forward to watching Step Brothers on Blu-ray after the kids go to bed.
At wrestling practice with Miles.
Just had a nice chat about social media and blogging at Nationwide with @tgwilson.
Making sure everything is ready for Mira's birthday tomorrow. I'm sure she'll wake up super early to open her presents.
Discovering another one of my fraternity brothers lives in Columbus. That makes 5 people I went to college with who live here. Weird.
Ready for the weekend. Mira turns 5 tomorrow. She is super excited.
Catching up on e-mail after being off-site all day yesterday.
So much for the work-from-home idea. VPN connection is hosed and I can't get our help desk guys on the phone.
Feeling like I am getting sick. This might be a work from home day today.
Cracking up at @armonde's Twitter bio: "Al Bundy meets John Stamos... ok John Goodman"
Gonna unwind with a little Gears of War 2, I think.
Uploading some photos from our offsite pizza-making extravaganza http://ping.fm/cMSwo
Back from the team off-site. Spent the day offline with @kshear, @littlebean00, @gregoryjsmith, @pamaroo and @cgcotton.
Heading to @littlebean00's for a team off-site.
Cracking up that @TechCrunch is critiquing the NYT's "clutter." Check out your own right column, guys.
Looking forward to Steelers-Cowboys. Was a huge Pittsburgh fan as a kid and still hate the Cowboys because of it.
Surprised at how cold it is this morning: 17 degrees.
New blog post: Happy 5th Birthday, Mira! http://tinyurl.com/66pw6c
Uploading photos from Mira's birthday. http://ping.fm/pYvDd
Back from a crazy trip to Chuck E. Cheese. The kids had a great time.
Watching the snow
Getting ready for a relaxing afternoon at Chuck E. Cheese.
Mira's presents were a hit especially the Sip 'n' Slurp Baby Alive.
New blog post: Glad this fantasy football season is over http://tinyurl.com/65t7ua
Getting ready to try out Shaun White Snowboarding on the Wii.
Wondering where the day went.
Cracking up at @nickhuhn for closing his e-mail to me with "Merry Christmas71." Nice!
Looking for a screenshot of Deloitte's D Street internal social network for a PPT. Anyone from Deloitte willing to share one?
Makin' PPTs.
Fighting with Lotus Notes and losing.
Scanning one last batch of college photos and uploading to Facebook.
Alabama got the worst of the BCS situation (although I'm sure Texas feels the same way).
Enjoying some tasty, homemade peanut butter cookies that Amy made.
How 'bout them... Steelers!
On a conference call with a prospective vendor and our attorneys.
Had to leave work early. Feeling rough. I'm sure the 3-hr call with contract attorneys this afternoon will make me feel better.
Finally getting some breakfast and coffee after fasting for my health assessment.
Eager to try out PlayStation Home tomorrow. Played with it for a minute when we were at IPG's Emerging Media Lab in September.
Struggling without coffee this morning. Having lab work done at 8am, so I can't eat or drink 'til then.
Wondering if I can convince @littlebean00 to send me to Vegas for the CES social media event. http://tinyurl.com/5mah5k Makes sense to me :)
Getting the kids ready for bed so we can watch The Dark Knight on Blu-ray. Amy hasn't seen it yet.
New blog post: Review: Acer Aspire AOA-150 http://tinyurl.com/5uvxnm
Setting up Twitter keyword alert e-mails on Tweetbeep.com
Heading to a NASCAR meeting.
Tempted by the Seagate hard drive on Woot! Too bad it's a refurb with a 6 mo. warranty. Gotta have that 5 year Seagate warranty.
Eating lunch at my desk. Probably wouldn't have ordered Shepherd's Pie had I known what Shepherd's Pie actually was.
Just ran into @sethmsparks in the Plaza 1 cafeteria. @adamranes was too cool and just blew right past. Iowans!
Drinking some coffee and checking in on the Woot! Off.
Cranking through my to-do list prior to a morning meeting and afternoon off-site.
Reading about the passing of Bettie Page yesterday. http://tinyurl.com/18r
Wishing my mom a Happy Birthday... on Facebook.
Feeling pretty refreshed after a full 8 hours of sleep. That doesn't happen often.
Working through a very busy morning. Trying to get a project pushed through before EOY.
Coffee, SportsCenter and day 3 of the Woot! Off. Not a bad way to kick off the morning.
Listening to the overlapping sounds of Miles playing Wii Play in the family room and Mahlon playing Gears 2 in the manroom.
Feeling quite a bit better than I did this morning.
Moving into our 4th hour of contract negotiations. Good times!
Thinking I'm not going to be able to use my 2 Eagles of Death Metal tickets for tomorrow night at Newport Music Hall. Anyone want them?
Finally ordering my Blackberry. Despite the early reviews, I chose the Storm over the Bold. Heckle if you must.
This is my 7,000th update. Works out to about 9 posts per day over the past 2 years (joined in Dec. '06).
Filling out lots and lots of forms.
Checking out Mahalo's new Answers feature
Burning through my to-do list this morning. One PPT finished and holiday time off scheduled, so far.
Stayed up too late last night. Gonna need lots of coffee this morning.
Just tuned into Survivor in time to see who won.
Watching football
Spent most of the day offline. Dad and stepmom visited for the day.
Busy, but productive day. Got the vendor contract finalized and had a dept. off-site.
Just finished re watching Step Brothers with my mom. Just as funny (IMHO) the second time.
Watching Time Warp. Love this show.
Pairing the Storm with my Jawbone. Everything is set up now.
Installing apps on the Storm
Stopping into the office to pickup my Blackberry Storm.
Wishing my Eye-Fi card supported uploading to two photo-sharing services at the same time. Wanna push photos to Facebook and Flickr.
Waiting for Amy and the kids to get home from Memphis
Waking up to -13 degree wind chill in Delaware County.
Ready for Amy and the kids to get back from Memphis already.
Using the fireplace for the first time. It's really cold in Columbus tonight.
Cheering on the Patriots
Heading out to pick up some last-minute Christmas gifts.
How. 'Bout. Them. Cowboys... let's see if the 3rd string Raven's RB can get a 50+ yard TD run.
Love to see the Cowboys lose.
Just finished up the campaign in Gears of War 2. Guess it's time to start Fallout 3.
Making a list of things to tackle around the house while Amy and the kids are in Memphis this weekend.
Ready for my vacation to start...
Just dominated the UE team as half of the most potent Cornhole team in Nationwide history!
Looks out my freaking out was for nothing. We are just about done with this contract. Woot!
